title: o11y toolkit
content:
The o11y toolkit is a set of utilities that help you debugging, augmenting, and manage your observability stacks.
This toolkit is WIP.
This toolkit is currently in early development. The tools here do not have stable API’s and might not work as expected.

title: oy-expose
content:
This toolkit is WIP.
This toolkit is currently in early development. The tools here do not have stable API’s and might not work as expected.  Usage     usage: oy-expose [<flags>] Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). --log.level=info Only log messages with the given severity or above. One of: [debug, info, warn, error] --log.format=logfmt Output format of log messages. One of: [logfmt, json] --version Show application version. Description     oy-expose reads a metrics file and exposes its content to be scraped by a Prometheus server.
Downloading     docker  To execute oy-expose with docker, run:
docker run quay.io/o11y/oy-toolkit:oy-expose --help   nix  To execute oy-expose with nix, run:
nix run github:o11ydev/oy-toolkit#oy-expose -- --help
